kjv_def: bad, evil, harm, ill, noisome, wicked
strongs_def: worthless (intrinsically, such; whereas G4190 (κακός) properly refers to effects), i.e. (subjectively) depraved, or (objectively) injurious
outline:
1. of a bad nature
    1. not such as it ought to be
  2. of a mode of thinking, feeling, acting
    1. base, wrong, wicked
  3. troublesome, injurious, pernicious, destructive, baneful
